Village_Settlement: The village of Shanglin has more than 200 people.
Surname_Groups: The majority of the people are of the Lin 林 surname group. This village was originally part of Pengmu 彭墓, but it branched off later on. There is only one Huang 黄 household.
Village_Temples: Zhaoling xinshê 昭灵新社 is dedicated to Zunzhu mingwang 尊主明王 and Houtu furen 后土夫人. The secondary gods are Tiangong yuanshuai 田公元帅 and Sima shengwang 司马圣王.

Rituals.Yuanxiao processions: On 1/17–19 Huiji shenghou 慧济圣侯, Zunzhu mingwang 尊主明王 and Houtu furen 后土夫人 are carried in a procession through the villages of Shanglin 上林, Xuke 徐柯, Pengmu 彭墓, and Mazhukeng 马竹坑. Each year three Daoist ritual masters are invited to conduct a jiao 建醮.
Rituals.Birthday celebrations of the gods: 5/16: All the birthdays of all the gods are celebrated together on this day. Opera is performed for two days, and a single Daoist ritual master recites scriptures.
